text:
I appreciate Select Quote: finding the right insurance company for me.
I didn't want many agencies emailing or calling me with there Quote: s as that would be too tedious and time consuming on my part. Thank you for doing all of the ground work. Aaron was great to work with.
Sincerely,
Ray Keeney
